SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ProviderVideo] ( [ProviderVideo_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [ProviderVideo_Descrizione] varchar(20) NULL , [ProviderVideo_UserInsert] int NULL , [ProviderVideo_UserUpdate] int NULL , [ProviderVideo_UserDelete] int NULL , [ProviderVideo_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [ProviderVideo_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [ProviderVideo_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[ProviderVideo] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_ProviderVideo PRIMARY KEY ([ProviderVideo_Ky])
